mapper.insert: insert into online_test_system.student(account, password, real_name, sex) VALUE (#{student.account},#{student.password},#{student.account},"ç”·");
mapper.select: select c.id,c.name, c.class_code,t.id,t.account,t.sex,t.real_name from (select cid from online_test_system.mid_class_student where sid = #{student.id}) as m join online_test_system.class c on c.id = m.cid join online_test_system.teacher t on t.id = c.tid;

select e.id, e.release_time, e.start_time, e.duration, e.name, e.max_submit,e.tpid,e.sjid,e.cid from (select mes.eid from online_test_system.mid_exam_student as mes where mes.sid=1) as m left join online_test_system.exam as e on m.eid = e.id where e.start_time < now()and now() < e.release_time;

select e.id, e.release_time, e.start_time, e.duration, e.name, e.max_submit,e.tpid,e.sjid,e.cid from (select mes.eid from online_test_system.mid_exam_student as mes where mes.sid=1) as m left join online_test_system.exam as e on m.eid = e.id where now() > e.release_time;

select e.id,e.name,e.cid,e.sjid,e.tpid,e.max_submit,e.duration,e.start_time,e.release_time from (select mes.eid, mes.id ,mes.score from online_test_system.mid_exam_student as mes where mes.sid = #{student.id}) as m join online_test_system.exam as e on e.id = m.eid join online_test_system.mid_exam_student_question as mesq on mesq.mesid = m.id join online_test_system.question q on mesq.qid = q.id where q.answers = mesq.answers or mesq.answers is null or mes.score is null group by e.id;

select m.id,m.name,m.sjid,m.tid,qb.id qbid,qb.sjid,qb.name,qb.type,q.id qid,q.tid,q.type,q.sjid,q.stem,q.options from (select id, name, sjid, tid from online_test_system.test_paper where id = #{exam.tpid}) as m join online_test_system.mid_tpaper_qbank as mtq on m.id = mtq.tpid join online_test_system.question_bank qb on mtq.qbid = qb.id join online_test_system.mid_qbank_question mqq on qb.id = mqq.qbid join online_test_system.question q on mqq.qid = q.id;

select m.id,m.name,m.sjid,m.tid, qb.id qbid,qb.sjid,qb.name,qb.type,q.id qid,q.tid,q.type,q.sjid,q.stem,q.options,q.answers, mtq.question_score,mtq.judge_type from (select id, name, sjid, tid from online_test_system.test_paper where id = #{exam.tpid}) as m join online_test_system.mid_tpaper_qbank as mtq on m.id = mtq.tpid join online_test_system.question_bank qb on mtq.qbid = qb.id join online_test_system.mid_qbank_question mqq on qb.id = mqq.qbid join online_test_system.question q on mqq.qid = q.id;

select tp.id,tp.name,tp.sjid,tp.tid, qb.id qbid,qb.name,qb.type, q.id qid,q.stem,q.answers,q.`explain` from online_test_system.test_paper tp join online_test_system.exam e on tp.id = e.tpid and e.id = #{exam.id} join online_test_system.mid_exam_student mes on e.id = mes.eid and mes.sid = #{student.id} join online_test_system.mid_tpaper_qbank mtq on tp.id = mtq.tpid join online_test_system.question_bank qb on mtq.qbid = qb.id join online_test_system.mid_qbank_question mqq on qb.id = mqq.qbid join online_test_system.question q on mqq.qid = q.id join online_test_system.mid_exam_student_question mesq on q.id = mesq.qid and mesq.mesid = mes.id where mesq.answers != q.answers or mesq.answers is null;
